comment.author: 64838194@N02
comment._content: This building has been the set of a few period films--three versions of Jane Eyre (one by Zeffirelli), 2005's "Pride & Prejudice" (w/Keira Knightly), and also, Haddon has also "The Other Boleyn Girl" featuring Natalie Portman and Scarlett Johansson. Another film shot here was "The Princess Bride". Haddon was the location for Humperdinck's castle. For more info, visit the hall's website: www.haddonhall.co.uk/film-and-photo-shoots/
